H0.text: Pollen are seeds that remain inactive until the right conditions of light, water, and soil are present.

H1.text: Dormant is the term for seeds that remain inactive until the right conditions of light, water, and soil are present.

H2.text: Flowers are seeds that remain inactive until the right conditions of light, water, and soil are present.

H3.text: Recycled seeds remain inactive until the right conditions of light, water, and soil are present.

A4.text: These photoblastic seeds need a period of darkness or light to germinate.

A5.text: The seeds are released but need to have a lower moisture content before germination can begin.
